sentences.en: " Now don't be touchy, but is she reliable? "
sentences.cn: “ 你可别多心, 她到底可靠不可靠 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: Asking about a reporter’s sources can be a touchy business.
sentences.cn: 询问一名记者的消息来源有时是个敏感问题。

sentences.en: Babbitt had recovered form his touchy wrath before Joe returned.
sentences.cn: 乔回来之前,巴比特莫名其妙的怒气已经平息.

sentences.en: Be careful what you say because he's touchy.
sentences.cn: 你说话小心,因为他容易生气.

sentences.en: But they have also been a little touchy about it.
sentences.cn: 但是他们也有一点神经过敏.

sentences.en: Don't ask Bill about his divorce; it's a touchy subject.
sentences.cn: 别问比尔他离婚的事儿, 那是个敏感的话题.

sentences.en: Formal, exact and obstinate, he was also cold, suspicious, touchy and tactless.
sentences.cn: 严肃、严谨、倔强的他同时又冷漠、多疑、敏感、不会变通。

sentences.en: He's a little touchy about his weight.
sentences.cn: 他对自己的体重感到有点儿苦恼。

sentences.en: He's touchy as a bear with a sore nose.
sentences.cn: 他现在就像一只鼻子受了伤的熊一样不好惹.

sentences.en: It's more of touchy - feel kind of meeting right now.
sentences.cn: 现在更像是一次试探性的会晤.

sentences.en: Luca was very touchy. Maybe the Don offended him some way.
sentences.cn: 路加这人感情容易冲动, 也许是老头子惹恼了他,这是可能的.

sentences.en: Parliament would be touchy about bartering British soil for ships.
sentences.cn: 用英国国土换取舰只,议会感到为难.

sentences.en: She is very touchy about her past.
sentences.cn: 她对自己的过去非常敏感。

sentences.en: They are touchy on the subject of religion and you have to pick your words carefully when talking about it.
sentences.cn: 他们对宗教问题很敏感,因此涉及这个问题时你说话要小心.

words.tran_cn: 过敏的；易生气的；难以取悦的

trans.tran_cn: 易动气的，小心眼的，需要小心对待的，棘手的
